notes.note:
Firefox now protects you from [supercookies][0], a type of tracker that can stay hidden in your browser and track you online, even after you clear cookies. By isolating supercookies, Firefox prevents them from tracking your web browsing from one site to the next.

[0]: https://blog.mozilla.org/security/2021/01/26/supercookie-protections/

text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox.


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2021/01/25/new-contributors-to-firefox-85/
title: Firefox for Android 85.0 Release
